body.name: Tiny Land Large Wooden Building Blocks for Toddlers 1-3, Toddler Blocks Toys with Storage Bag, Innovative Shapes & Variety Colors to Build More Combinations(34PCS)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 35 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 🎁【Large Building Blocks Set】Bring the magic of building to your child's playtime with the Tiny Land Wooden Building Blocks Set! With 34 large wooden blocks in 6 different colors and 15 shapes, your toddler can let their imagination run wild as they create and build their own masterpieces, with a bonus storage bag, making it easy to keep the blocks organized and portable for on-the-go playtime.

🎁【Blocks Designed for Toddlers 1-3】Different from other common building blocks, our building blocks are specially designed for toddlers aged 1-3, we have chosen the most suitable number of blocks, which are larger in size to fit comfortably in little hands. The blocks are also designed with safety in mind, so you can rest assured that your child won't accidentally swallow any small pieces.

🎁【Safety Comes First】Your baby’s safety is our first priority! When making toys, we only use high-quality, non-toxic materials to ensure your child's safety. High-quality and durable wood gives the baby longer companionship and will not collapse easily during creation.

🎁【Educational & Skill Building】Playing with Tiny Land building blocks not only provides endless hours of fun but also helps to develop important skills such as concentration, cognitive abilities, and recognition. Your child will be able to build whatever shape they want, and the process will give them a sense of satisfaction and enhance their self-confidence.

🎁【Great Gift for You Little One】If you are looking for an amazing gift for toddlers then you will love our toddler blocks, whether it's for birthdays, Christmas, or any other special occasion, this set is the perfect gift for your little one! Unleash your child's creativity and let their imagination soar with the Tiny Land wooden building blocks Set!

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 144 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Okay I was worried about buying these because there were mixed reviews on the size of the blocks being okay for littles. I realllly wanted neutral blocks though, so I decided to just purchase and see. Firstly, they are SO cute. They are super good quality, and I even love the dust bag that it comes with. Second, I truly don’t see how a block could choke a baby. They ARENT tiny. There is no way a child could swallow them. They aren’t as big as the pictures make them look, but nothing to worry about. They are great for my one year old and two year old (and safety is a big deal to me, so I don’t say that lightly!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My kids love
reviews.reviewText: I love these blocks. Love the colors, the quality and I love they entertain my kids for more than 5 seconds! I would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good toy good value for supervised play
reviews.reviewText: Nice finished blocks. Just the right size for toddler hands. I did tie knots to shorten the drawstrings when he looped them around his neck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Some pieces are too small
reviews.reviewText: The advertising photos show as if pieces are large. When i got them they are much smaller. Photos are deceiving. Some pieces could be a choke hazard. I can only give a few large pieces for my toddler to play with and the rest will wait for later. Quality and color is nice and i hope color doesn’t get scratched since my baby puts everything is his mouth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This blocks were great for a kids bday. They are very sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars wouldnt buy again
reviews.reviewText: Package came damaged, missing pieces, some damaged blocks with chipped paint, false advertising on size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Large? I don’t think so!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this set to combine with a Melissa & Doug block set. The pieces in this set are mostly small with only a couple of larger blocks in the set. The photo on Amazon is extremely misleading - that child must be a dwarf (or a tiny person is more PC). Yes, I know they provided measurements of the blocks in their information but they were for my granddaughter who lives 3 hours away. Did they really want me to go measure the existing blocks as a comparison? I did look at the sizing, but I only measured one of the large blocks (which happened to be the first one on the list and given the photo, it looked like they were all similarly sized). I would have returned them but by the blocks are well done with nice paint colors and some interesting shapes. Granddaughter thinks they are ok, but we want to make a really big tower and these are like building in miniature. I wouldn’t recommend for toddlers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for my 1 year old niece! She loves playing with these blocks and it keeps her entertained! Easy to hold for little hands and puts her imagination to use!
